sentences.english: Millions of residences remain without power and water.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬戶家庭依然斷水斷電。

sentences.english: Last year, high winds stoked wildfires in Southern California and destroyed thousands of homes.
sentences.chinese: 去年，強烈的風勢加劇野火的災情，摧毀數千戶房屋。

sentences.english: That fire destroyed 38,000 acres and 21 homes.
sentences.chinese: 火火災造成了3萬8千英畝土地和21戶住宅的損失。
李家山一度曾有600戶居民。

sentences.english: You got any other households in the Hutchinsons?
sentences.chinese: 赫羣森家裏還有別的戶嗎？

sentences.english: Many users have commented that maybe it there should be a return value to signal this condition instead of an exception.
sentences.chinese: 許多苚戶說咜應該返回弌個信號而不湜弌個異常。

sentences.english: " Well salt production of households who engaged in the main referred to as "kitchen household.
sentences.chinese: 從事井鹽生產的人戶主要稱爲“竈戶”。

sentences.english: The black dog was there, too, but the small tin soldier looked straight at the pretty paper house and at the beautiful dancer.
sentences.chinese: 小錫士兵環顧四周，發現他又回到了同一戶人家。

sentences.english: Can the same user ID be login at different places?
sentences.chinese: 戶可以於兩個地方同時使用嗎？

sentences.english: Educated Korea nationality youth W told us a story.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮族知青W來我們戶玩的時候講了一個故事。

sentences.english: This colony, a five storied building, alone houses nearly 210 families.
sentences.chinese: 這個五層樓高的工寮裏，住着近210戶人家。

sentences.english: Rammick lives high on a ridge in a 400-home subdivision.
sentences.chinese: 拉米克住在高聳的山脊上一片有400戶人家的地方。

sentences.english: All the windows were bricked up.
I want to open an account with [at] a bank.
sentences.chinese: 我想在一家銀行開個戶。

sentences.english: Zhang Ling's husband, family letters and visits from high-jumped a tree or high paraplegia .
sentences.chinese: 信訪戶張玲的丈夫從高樹上跌摔成高位截癱。

sentences.english: Treasure chicken city is the old industry town that Shaanxi visits, have state-owned company 361.
sentences.chinese: 寶雞市是陝西省的老工業城，有國有企業361戶。
